TITLE: Hybrid
DEF: Content delivery in both virtual spaces and physical presence
TASK: The Hybrid Learning pattern supports assists in the combination of online and face-to-face instruction, providing flexibility and enhanced collaboration opportunities. It's ideal for learners unable to attend regular in-person sessions. To effectively implement the pattern, ensure that synchronous online sessions are engaging, accessible, and promote interaction between students and instructors. The challenges lie in balancing online and in-person elements, technology reliance, and ensuring all learners have equal access to resources.
